title: REQ: ID - yes, I'm very, very stupid...
content:
Hi all,

I’m seriously struggling to find this face on my system - and these are the only two characters I have available. To compound matters, it’s from a design I put together myself but managed to create outlines in Illustrator without noting anything down.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009110054im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-2_4213.png)
  
Any ideas? Other than yes, I am stupid?

Cheers,

s

 [‹ POM Wonderful Typeface ID, Thanks!](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009110054/http:/typophile.com/node/49364 "Go to previous forum topic") [condensed san serif -- could someone identify? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009110054/http:/typophile.com/node/49359 "Go to next forum topic")
author: nert

comments.content:
Ah! The freebie...

Thank you! [I was convinced it was a Zapf face - we have the Hermann & Gudrun Zapf Collection] but alas, I was thinking of the rather wonderful Columbine...

Thanks again,

s

<cite>I was convinced it was a Zapf face</cite>

That’s not bad for a freebie ;-) BTW the image you’ve posted is the “old” Fertigo and is no longer available. Below a pic of Fertigo Pro.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009110054im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tv_4056.png)
